name: CHIP-8 Web Toolchain
description: A virtual machine, disassembler, debugger, and compiler toolchain for the CHIP-8. The toolchain was built with Rust, and exposed to a web-interface via WebAssembly.

name: rs2
description: A mod for the PS1 game Spyro 2. Written in C, the mod hooks original game functionality to add new features, controlled by an in-game menu. Development required extensive reverse-engineering of the game with Ghidra.
